expires.description: Expiration time of the cache entry.

lastAccess.description: The last time the cache entry was opened.

hitCount.description: The number of times the cache entry has been opened.

comment.description: A comment provided by the user or the application.

beforeRequest.description: State of a cache entry before the request. Leave out this field if the information is not available.

afterRequest.description: State of a cache entry after the request. Leave out this field if the information is not available.

comment.description: A comment provided by the user or the application.
